pullrequest.title: Allow submeshes to be used as visuals and collisions

content.raw:
``<center>true/false, where true = center vertices at 0,0,0</center>``

A more clear documentations is needed for this ... false leaves the mesh the way it is and true does what exactly? Centering all vertices at 0,0,0 would result in a dot. Or does ``<center>`` take in a new position for the center?



"This pull-request is an example: http://westernwheelersbicycleclub.memberlodge.com/sequoia"

wrong link? :)

<center>true/false, where true = center vertices at 0,0,0</center>
